  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: rows

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)


df <- read.csv("/Users/ethanjohn/Desktop/Data Science/Projects/Datasets/Students Social Media Addiction copy.csv")
```

## Mental Health Overview
Row
----------------------------------------
### Count of Students by Mental Health Score
```{r bar_chart, include = TRUE}
ggplot(df, aes(x = factor(Mental_Health_Score))) + geom_bar(fill  = "orange", color = "white") + labs(title = "Count of Students by Mental Health Score", x = "Score", y = "Number of students") + theme_minimal()
```

### Boxplot of Mental Health Scores by Gender
```{r box_plot, include = TRUE}
ggplot(df, aes(x = Gender, y = Mental_Health_Score, fill = Gender)) + geom_boxplot(alpha=0.7) + labs(title = "Mental Health Scores by Gender", x = "Gender", y = "Mental Health Scores") + theme_minimal() + theme(legend.position = "none")
```

### Density Plot of Mental Health Scores
```{r density plot}
ggplot(df, aes(x = Mental_Health_Score)) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + labs(title = "Mental Health of Students", x = "Mental Health Score", y = "Density") + theme_minimal()
```

### Density Plot of Addicted Scores by Gender
```{r density plot2}
ggplot(df, aes(x = Addicted_Score, fill = Gender)) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + labs(title = "Addicted Score", x = "Addicted Score by Gender", y = "Density")
```
